title: Riot response to Normal Draft posts
body:
Has any Riot employee replied to any of the posts on any server about the removal of Normal Draft?

If not, I have to wonder if they've been ordered not to because there are so many with so many upvotes that they should have gotten some replies by now.

replies.body: They did but cause ppl kept creating more threads and saying the same the comments went underground

Could you send a link to one?

I'd just like to see what they said.
